summary:
There is fear, darkness, and excitement.
Add mazy catacombs with crowds of undead.
descriptionHtml:
Marsh Catacombs
Developed for Skyrim version 1.7.7.0

*For Dawnguard DLC version available
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


INTRODUCTION
_____________________________
Add mazy catacombs in north marsh of Morthal. There is filled with crowds of undead.

Structure of catacombs is non-linear maze and you can freely explore, but undeads can do same.
you have opportunity to meet many undeads gathering in one place and you will often get multiple-wave encounter.
Stay sharp always.

In catacomb, lighting is very dark but keep minimum visibility.
If you fully enjoy darkness, i recommend that do not use torch or other illumination except when it is truely necessary.

You can lead followers everyplace in dungeon.



ENTRANCE OF DUNGEON
_____________________________
Entrance door locate in north of Morthal(Check map image in Image Page). 
Dungeon\'s icon is already shown on map before discovered.



NOTE FOR GAMEPLAY
_____________________________
You can knock down Skeleton wearing armor by Unrelenting Force Shout.
This is same as Armored Skeleton race in Dawnguard DLC.



DIFFICULTY AND PLAYTIME
_____________________________
Difficulty is Hard. Not HardCore.
But if you limit the skill/craft/equipment/item more than normal gameplay, you will meet nightmare.
Playtime is probably slightly longer than Vanilla\'s middle-size dungeon.



INSTALL AND UNINSTALL
_____________________________
You can easily install & uninstall by using Mod manager(Nexus Mod Manager, Wrye Bash).
Simply download .zip file and install it directly.

If you want manual install, unzip download file and copy them to your skyrim/Data folder.
Don\'t miss check all plugins(.esm / .esp) in \"DATA FILES\" section on SKYRIM launcher.



CONSOLE COMMAND
_____________________________
If you have problem about entering dungeon, Type below command in console.

Move to entrance point on field.
cow tamriel -11 20

Direct teleport to dungeon\'s first floor.
coc saixml07a1



IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE...
_____________________________
Experienced MOD users, Please try basic check before report trouble.
1.Download file is not broken.
2.Install file in right place and check activate.
3.Change load-order.
4.Run MOD on Vanilla environment.
author: saixml
